attributes.action: Revoke the "Revoke Article 50 and remain in the EU" petition.
attributes.background: I want to start a never ending cycle of petitions because I don't like the petition this petition is aimed against.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not possible to "revoke a petition".

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
